summary: A custom script for using knockback on weapons.
descriptionHtml:
This is a custom script for using knockback effects on weapons. The use of the vanilla VoicePushEffectScript on weapons causes a glitch whereby targets become invincible for a short time after a killmove is used on them.

This script functions almost identically to the vanilla VoicePushEffectScript, but has a condition whereby the knockback effect is not triggered during killmoves, eliminating the glitch.

This file is a modders resource and can be freely used and distributed without accreditiation.
author: Ominousvoice
